dict.acceptation: 宫，宫殿；（主教）邸宅，宏伟大厦；华丽的娱乐场所；

sent.orig: The most important palaces are Taihe Palace, Zhonghe Palace and Baohe Palace.
sent.trans: 最重要的宫殿就是太和殿，中和殿和保和殿。

sent.orig: East Palace, West Palace has 3 version, stage play script, film script and fiction.
sent.trans: 《东宫西宫》共有三个版本，舞台剧本、电影剧本、小说。

sent.orig: As France's imperial palace, Versailles Palace precipitated several generation of French's wisdoms and the wealth.
sent.trans: 作为法国的皇家宫殿，凡尔赛宫沉淀了几代法国人的智慧和财富。

sent.orig: PALACE His home a palace compared with our poor little house.
sent.trans: 他家和我们贫穷的小房子比起来，可算是个宫殿。

sent.orig: During the reconstruction of the palace, lots of glazed tiles are carried into the palace.
sent.trans: 宫殿翻修期间，大量的琉璃瓦被运入宫中。
